title: Ticket #5241: documentation of -autoformat is inconsistent for various tools
description:
In the various man pages that have the -af or -autoformat option, they doc is different for each one, and they are not really consistent with each other. This includes condor_history, _q, _status, _userprio (new), and _who.

The doc (manpage) for condor_history does NOT include a 'r' specifier. So, either _userprio doesn't have what it claims, or the doc is wrong. In addition, none of the pages other than _userprio list a 'g' specifier.
remarks:
2016-Jun-29 16:15:05 by wenger:
Note that for condor_history and condor_userprio, at least, the 'j' option was added in the 8.5 series. So once I fix this in 8.4.8, I need to merge things to 8.5.6 and then manually fix what has changed...

2016-Jun-30 10:20:04 by johnkn:
CODE REVIEW code changes (usage messages) looks good.

2016-Jun-30 11:57:10 by wenger:
This is now committed in 8.4.8, merged to 8.4, merged to 8.5.6 (with slight changes to match 8.5 code changes) and merged to master/8.5, so I'm going to resolve the ticket.
